personalInfo.name: Tanmay Anil Deorukhakar
personalInfo.title: Aspiring Software Engineer | AI & ML Enthusiast
personalInfo.currentStatus: B.E Computer Science Engineering (AIML) student at Mumbai University
personalInfo.availability: Open for internships and full-time opportunities starting 2026

about: Computer Science Engineering student specializing in AI & ML at Mumbai University. Passionate about building real-world software applications with strong problem-solving and full-stack development skills. Recently won global hackathon, completed AI internship, and published research on vehicle recognition systems.
longAbout: I'm Tanmay, a third-year Computer Science Engineering student from Mumbai with specialization in AI & ML. My journey started with curiosity about how apps work, and now I'm building solutions that have won global hackathons like Hackonomics 2025. I've interned at NextLeap AI, published research on vehicle recognition systems, and love participating in cybersecurity competitions. When I'm not coding, you'll find me solving algorithmic challenges, exploring Mumbai's coffee scene, or writing technical blogs about my experiences.

projects.name: DSAdojo - Gamified DSA Learning Platform
projects.description: Duolingo-style interface for mastering Data Structures and Algorithms with daily streaks, XP system, and leaderboards
projects.longDescription: DSAdojo revolutionizes how students learn Data Structures and Algorithms by gamifying the entire experience. Features categorized question bank with MCQs, fill-in-the-blanks, code-completion, and drag & drop exercises.

projects.name: StockSim - Stock Market Simulator
projects.description: Risk-free stock trading simulator for beginners using real-time market data. Winner of Hackonomics 2025 Global Hackathon
projects.longDescription: StockSim addresses financial literacy by providing a hands-on, risk-free environment for learning stock trading using real-time market data with gamification elements.

projects.name: NutriScan - AI-Powered Nutrition Analyzer
projects.description: OCR-powered tool that scans food labels, extracts nutritional values, and evaluates food healthiness using AI
projects.longDescription: NutriScan empowers users to make informed food choices by leveraging OCR technology and AI analysis. Provides health risk summaries and personalized dietary recommendations.

projects.name: Swassth Mumbai - Smart Health & Safety Companion
projects.description: Comprehensive web app empowering vulnerable communities in Mumbai with real-time health and safety information
projects.longDescription: Tackles urban health resilience by providing comprehensive health information to Mumbai's vulnerable communities. Features AQI monitoring, disease mapping, mental health chatbot.

projects.name: Vehicle Number Plate Recognition System
projects.description: Python-based system using OpenCV and deep learning to detect license plates. Achieved 92% accuracy with published research paper
projects.longDescription: Comprehensive Vehicle Number Plate Recognition system demonstrating advanced computer vision and deep learning techniques. Led to a published 25-page research paper.

experience.description: Contributed to building comprehensive academic Q&A platform covering questions from various Indian textbooks and competitive exams
responsibilities: Data curation by capturing screenshots of textbook questions and answers
Used internal AI-powered portal for question text extraction and validation
Reviewed and regenerated AI-generated answers for accuracy
Quality assurance of thousands of academic entries
achievements: Processed thousands of academic Q&A entries

funFacts: I debug better with coffee - there's a direct correlation between caffeine levels and code quality!
My GitHub contribution graph looks like a heartbeat monitor during hackathon seasons
I can explain recursion in 3 different ways, but still get confused by CSS flexbox sometimes
I've named my laptop 'Wilson' after Tom Hanks' volleyball - it's my coding companion
I solve LeetCode problems during Mumbai local train commutes
My favorite debugging technique is explaining problems to my rubber duck (yes, I have one)
I can type faster on keyboard than write with pen
I've watched 'The Social Network' 7 times for motivation
I dream in code sometimes - literally fixed a React component bug in my sleep
My search history is 80% Stack Overflow and 20% 'how to center a div'
I once spent 3 hours debugging only to find I forgot a semicolon in CSS
My coffee-to-code ratio is approximately 1 cup per 50 lines of code

hobbies: what do you do for fun

greeting: Hey there! I'm Tanmay, a computer science student from Mumbai who loves building cool stuff with code. What would you like to know about me?
Hello! Nice to meet you. I'm Tanmay - currently studying CS with AI/ML specialization and always excited to chat about tech!
Hi! I'm Tanmay, an aspiring software engineer who recently won a global hackathon and loves turning coffee into code.
responseTemplates.aboutShort: I'm a third-year Computer Science student at Mumbai University, specializing in AI/ML. I'm passionate about full-stack development, have won hackathons, completed internships, and I'm always working on interesting projects that solve real problems.
responseTemplates.projectsOverview: I've built 5 major projects ranging from gamified learning platforms to AI-powered health tools. My standout project, StockSim, won the global Hackonomics 2025 hackathon.
